titleStmt.title: The arte of Christian saylinge. Or a comfortable treatis written on these words of the prophet Dauid in the 55. Psal. 22. 23. verses
titleStmt.author: Hull, John, 1569 or 70-1627.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by J. Harrison 3 and S. Stafford] for Iohn Harison [4] dwelling in pater noster row at the signe of the gilden Vnicorne and Bible and are there to be sould,

notesStmt.note: J. Harrison 3 printed only the preliminaries--STC.
Printers names and publisher's exact designation from STC.
Running title reads: The arte of Christian sayling.
Imperfect; some pages stained and some print faded and show-through.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: pater noster row at the signe of the gilden Vnicorne
